articles.title: A top return from Bruins’ roster teardown, prospect Fraser Minten is looking to stick in NHL
articles.description:
“[He’s] super young, but you wouldn't know it if you talked to him."

The post A top return from Bruins’ roster teardown, prospect Fraser Minten is looking to stick in NHL appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Fraser Minten aims to secure a permanent spot on the Bruins' NHL roster.
Minten, a young prospect, is a key return from the Bruins' recent roster changes.
His success could enhance the Bruins' competitiveness for Boston fans this season.

articles.title: Police issue all clear after UMass Boston reports ‘public safety threat’
articles.description:
The university announced at 5:11 p.m. that police said there is no ongoing threat to the community.

The post Police issue all clear after UMass Boston reports ‘public safety threat’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: UMass Boston reported a public safety threat, prompting police response.
At 5:11 p.m., police confirmed no ongoing threat to the community.
Students were advised to stay in their dorms during the incident.

articles.title: ‘I would join a boycott’: Why readers oppose Market Basket’s firing of Artie T.
articles.description:
A majority of the more than 2,500 readers who responded to the poll said they plan to boycott Market Basket.

The post ‘I would join a boycott’: Why readers oppose Market Basket’s firing of Artie T. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Market Basket's firing of Artie T. has sparked significant backlash among customers.
Over 2,500 readers participated in a poll, with many planning to boycott the store.
The boycott could impact Market Basket's sales and community relations in Boston.
